attributes.action: seek Royal ascent to dissolve the current government and call a general election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has brought the UK close to bankrupcy and become mired in sleaze to the point where MPs appear nothing more than swine in the trough.

This is all to clearly evidenced by Ministers of the Crown claiming expenses on properties they rent out, whilst living at the tax-payers expense.  It may be within the rules but it is wrong - If Ministers cannot tell right from wrong they should not be empowered by the people.

It is time for the people of Britain to call to account the politicians and also give the Parties the opportunity to campaign on how they are going to tackle the crisis and change UK politics to a basis of what is right and a common sense approach.

This has to be preferable to the muddled, sound-bite approach which has achieved nothing, indeed probably done harm, over the last year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
